item.title: By: catarina
item.dc:creator: catarina
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2012/04/12/hello-world/#comment-58">Ashfaq</a>.
I'm glad you like the badges! These were last year's, so they are not for sale and we don't have any left... Sorry you can't attend the summit in person, but we'll likely be live streaming it, so hopefully you can catch a few of the talks online.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ashfaq.

I’m glad you like the badges! These were last year’s, so they are not for sale and we don’t have any left… Sorry you can’t attend the summit in person, but we’ll likely be live streaming it, so hopefully you can catch a few of the talks online.

item.title: By: Ashfaq
item.dc:creator: Ashfaq
item.description: I just love the OH logo which you guys are giving out. the one in thepicture above. is there any place i can buy them?? I am from India, hence unfortunately cannot attend the summit. :( regards.
item.content:encoded:
